about_the_game:
Welcome to Your Very Own Store!

This is the story of you, the entrepreneur: starting from scratch with a bare-bones storefront, you’ll have the chance to build a bustling retail empire using all of the building tools and features available up to level 10.

Stake Your Claim

Every sunrise brings new challenges and opportunities: negotiate the best deals, delight your customers, and expand your brand with grit and ingenuity. Success isn’t handed to you – you build it, one aisle at a time.

  • Lay out your dream store with our full building editor

  • Choose from dozens of shelving options

  • Order products, fill your shelves, and set competitive prices to draw in customers

  • Strategically place checkout counters to maximize flow

  • Recruit, hire, and train employees to keep customers smiling

  • Expand your property, unlock new layouts, and turn your humble shop into a superstore

  • Design a shopping experience that keeps customers coming back

  • Make money, build your store up, and beat your competition

You Make The Rules!

Play Your Way: play solo in your own retail world or team up with up to 3 friends in 4-player co-op mode for the ultimate collaborative retail experience.

Expansion Up To Level 10: start small and dream big – expand your property and use the custom builder to make your perfect store.

Immersive Management: balance inventory, pricing, and customer satisfaction for a truly engaging business experience.

Don't just dream it. Do it. Build it.

Your empire awaits.

short_description: Build your retail empire! Tired of playing by someone else's rules? Design, build, stock, and manage your own retail paradise, from a humble corner shop to a sprawling commercial enterprise. Create a unique shopping experience and become a retail legend. Your customers are waiting!
